label: [{"start":36,"end":40,"text":"欧洲鸡瘟","labels":["disease"]},{"start":41,"end":45,"text":"真性鸡瘟","labels":["disease"]},{"start":20,"end":22,"text":"禽类","labels":["type"]},{"start":24,"end":25,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":3,"end":14,"text":"呼吸道和严重全身性感染","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":3,"end":6,"text":"呼吸道","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 表现为呼吸道和严重全身性感染。主要发生在禽类，如鸡、鸭、鹅、鸽子等。又称欧洲鸡瘟、真性鸡瘟。
按病原体致病性的大小，分为高致病性、低致病性和无致病性。

label: [{"start":2,"end":9,"text":"高致病性禽流感","labels":["disease"]},{"start":9,"end":12,"text":"传播快","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":13,"end":16,"text":"病情重","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":17,"end":22,"text":"病死率很高","labels":["symptom"]}]
text: 其中高致病性禽流感传播快、病情重、病死率很高。

label: [{"start":37,"end":42,"text":"人禽流感病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":19,"end":23,"text":"呼吸系统","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":27,"end":29,"text":"脏器","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":44,"end":49,"text":"病情进展快","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":50,"end":54,"text":"病死率高","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":29,"end":33,"text":"功能衰竭","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 由于病毒基因易发生变异，可感染人而发生呼吸系统和全身多脏器功能衰竭，称为“人禽流感病”，病情进展快，病死率高。
该病最早于1978年在意大利爆发，现已遍及世界各国。
20世纪90年代后期起，在欧亚大陆日趋频繁爆发。不但给一些国家家禽养殖业带来沉重打击，而且也向人类健康提出了严峻挑战。

label: [{"start":24,"end":26,"text":"气管","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":40,"end":50,"text":"H5N1型禽流感病毒","labels":["disease"]},{"start":61,"end":64,"text":"禽流感","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 1997年中国香港特区卫生署宣布从一个3岁男孩的气管分泌物中发现一种病毒，证明是H5N1型禽流感病毒，这是全球首例人类感染禽流感的个案。

label: [{"start":3,"end":4,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":8,"end":17,"text":"H5N1禽流感病毒","labels":["disease"]},{"start":36,"end":43,"text":"H5N1病毒株","labels":["disease"]},{"start":46,"end":49,"text":"禽流感","labels":["disease"]},{"start":57,"end":62,"text":"人禽流感病","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 同时在鸡场检查出H5N1禽流感病毒。越南、韩国、泰国、日本等国家已发现由H5N1病毒株引起的禽流感，有的国家已有“人禽流感病”发生。

label: [{"start":38,"end":42,"text":"H5N1","labels":["disease"]},{"start":45,"end":48,"text":"禽流感","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 但没有发现该病在人群中交叉感染。中国湖南、湖北、上海、广西、新疆等地，亦发现H5N1引起的禽流感，也未感染人。

label: [{"start":6,"end":8,"text":"病禽","labels":["type"]},{"start":9,"end":14,"text":"带病毒禽类","labels":["type"]},{"start":22,"end":24,"text":"禽类","labels":["type"]},{"start":26,"end":29,"text":"分泌物","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":30,"end":33,"text":"排泄物","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":47,"end":50,"text":"呼吸道","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":51,"end":54,"text":"消化道","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 传染源主要是病禽和带病毒禽类。通过接触感染的禽类及其分泌物和排泄物污染的饲料、水及其他物品，经呼吸道、消化道传播。

label: [{"start":4,"end":6,"text":"家禽","labels":["type"]},{"start":22,"end":24,"text":"禽类","labels":["type"]},{"start":36,"end":37,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":38,"end":40,"text":"火鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 不仅感染家禽，也可感染猪，人可通过接触感染的禽类及猪而受染。自然状态下，鸡、火鸡、鸭、鹅及多种野鸟均可感染。

label: [{"start":24,"end":26,"text":"家禽","labels":["type"]}]
text: 人工试验可感染猪、猫、雪貂、水貂和猴等。被感染的家禽和野鸟是主要传染源。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":4,"end":7,"text":"呼吸道","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":8,"end":10,"text":"结膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":11,"end":13,"text":"粪便","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":24,"end":26,"text":"粪便","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 病鸡可从呼吸道、结膜和粪便中排出病毒，通过空气与粪便污染饲料、饮水、设备和昆虫等进行传播，此病多发生于气候骤变的秋末冬初及冬季。

label: [{"start":4,"end":6,"text":"家禽","labels":["type"]}]
text: 潜伏期因家禽品种、感染途径及病毒株致病力的不同而有较大差异。

label: [{"start":0,"end":5,"text":"动物禽流感","labels":["disease"]},{"start":13,"end":18,"text":"急性禽流感","labels":["disease"]},{"start":21,"end":25,"text":"欧洲鸡瘟","labels":["disease"]},{"start":31,"end":32,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":33,"end":35,"text":"火鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":37,"end":41,"text":"突然爆发","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":42,"end":52,"text":"无先兆症状就突然死亡","labels":["symptom"]}]
text: 动物禽流感可分为两种类型：急性禽流感。又称欧洲鸡瘟，主要发生于鸡和火鸡，常突然爆发，无先兆症状就突然死亡，死亡率50%～100%。

label: [{"start":6,"end":13,"text":"消化道黏膜出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":11,"end":13,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":22,"end":29,"text":"灰黄色小坏死灶","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":22,"end":25,"text":"灰黄色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":31,"end":36,"text":"消化道症状","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":39,"end":42,"text":"禽流感","labels":["disease"]},{"start":6,"end":11,"text":"消化道黏膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":14,"end":15,"text":"肝","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":16,"end":17,"text":"脾","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":18,"end":19,"text":"肾","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":20,"end":21,"text":"肺","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":31,"end":34,"text":"消化道","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 特征性病变是消化道黏膜出血和肝、脾、肾、肺有灰黄色小坏死灶。以消化道症状为主的禽流感。

label: [{"start":5,"end":7,"text":"火鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":12,"end":13,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":18,"end":20,"text":"病禽","labels":["type"]},{"start":21,"end":25,"text":"食欲较差","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":26,"end":28,"text":"消瘦","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":29,"end":34,"text":"产蛋量减少","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":40,"end":47,"text":"明显的呼吸症状","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":49,"end":51,"text":"咳嗽","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":52,"end":54,"text":"啰音","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":56,"end":61,"text":"孵化率下降","labels":["symptom"]}]
text: 主要发生于火鸡、鸭、鹅，鸡很少发生。病禽除食欲较差、消瘦、产蛋量减少外，主要出现明显的呼吸症状，如咳嗽、啰音等，孵化率下降20%以上。

label: [{"start":14,"end":18,"text":"气囊发炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":16,"end":18,"text":"发炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":19,"end":23,"text":"滤泡变形","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":21,"end":23,"text":"变形","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":29,"end":42,"text":"气囊和鼻窦内有干酪样渗出物","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":36,"end":42,"text":"干酪样渗出物","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":5,"end":7,"text":"结膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":8,"end":10,"text":"鼻窦","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":11,"end":13,"text":"气管","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":14,"end":16,"text":"气囊","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":19,"end":21,"text":"滤泡","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":29,"end":31,"text":"气囊","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":32,"end":34,"text":"鼻窦","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 主要病变是结膜、鼻窦、气管和气囊发炎，滤泡变形，严重的可见气囊和鼻窦内有干酪样渗出物。
除上述两种类型外，还有不表现症状的，如野鸟的隐性感染。依据上述流行特点、症状和病变特征可作出初步诊断。确诊尚需根据病毒分离和鉴定。

label: [{"start":4,"end":10,"text":"综合防治措施","labels":["control"]},{"start":13,"end":20,"text":"疫情诊断和报告","labels":["control"]},{"start":21,"end":30,"text":"疫点疫区的隔离封锁","labels":["control"]},{"start":31,"end":35,"text":"扑杀病禽","labels":["control"]},{"start":36,"end":48,"text":"养禽场及其周围地区的消毒","labels":["control"]},{"start":49,"end":57,"text":"正常禽类接种疫苗","labels":["control"]},{"start":58,"end":68,"text":"把好出入境检验检疫关","labels":["control"]},{"start":33,"end":35,"text":"病禽","labels":["type"]}]
text: 主要采取综合防治措施，包括疫情诊断和报告、疫点疫区的隔离封锁、扑杀病禽、养禽场及其周围地区的消毒、正常禽类接种疫苗、把好出入境检验检疫关等。

label: [{"start":3,"end":12,"text":"单链负股RNA病毒","labels":["disease"]},{"start":24,"end":28,"text":"流感病毒","labels":["disease"]},{"start":30,"end":33,"text":"血凝素","labels":["disease"]},{"start":37,"end":42,"text":"神经氨酸酶","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 病原为单链负股RNA病毒，直径80～120纳米。流感病毒按其血凝素(H)和神经氨酸酶(N)的抗原性不同，可分为15个H亚型(H1～H15)和9个N亚型(N1～N9)。

label: [{"start":2,"end":7,"text":"人禽流感病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":15,"end":19,"text":"H5N1","labels":["disease"]},{"start":20,"end":24,"text":"H7N7","labels":["disease"]},{"start":25,"end":29,"text":"H9N2","labels":["disease"]},{"start":33,"end":37,"text":"H5N1","labels":["disease"]},{"start":8,"end":12,"text":"流感病毒","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 感染人禽流感病的流感病毒主要是H5N1、H7N7和H9N2，其中以H5N1引起的临床症状重，对人危害大。

label: [{"start":0,"end":5,"text":"禽流感病毒","labels":["disease"]},{"start":8,"end":10,"text":"乙醚","labels":["drug"]},{"start":11,"end":13,"text":"氯仿","labels":["drug"]},{"start":23,"end":27,"text":"福尔马林","labels":["drug"]},{"start":28,"end":32,"text":"过氧乙酸","labels":["drug"]},{"start":19,"end":22,"text":"消毒剂","labels":["drug"]},{"start":43,"end":56,"text":"阳光下和紫外线均可灭活病毒","labels":["control"]}]
text: 禽流感病毒对热、乙醚、氯仿等敏感，常用消毒剂如福尔马林、过氧乙酸等能迅速破坏其传染性，阳光下和紫外线均可灭活病毒。

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"人禽流感","labels":["disease"]},{"start":32,"end":35,"text":"起病急","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":45,"end":48,"text":"有发热","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":40,"end":44,"text":"类似流感","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":62,"end":65,"text":"稽留热","labels":["disease"]},{"start":66,"end":71,"text":"不规则热型","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 人禽流感临床表现潜伏期一般为10天。发病以儿童和年老体弱者多见。起病急，早期表现类似流感，有发热，体温多在38.5℃以上，以稽留热和不规则热型较多见。热程一般为2～3天，亦可达7天。

label: [{"start":1,"end":3,"text":"流涕","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":4,"end":6,"text":"鼻塞","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":7,"end":9,"text":"头痛","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":10,"end":14,"text":"全身不适","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":15,"end":19,"text":"肌肉酸痛","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":20,"end":22,"text":"恶心","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":23,"end":25,"text":"腹痛","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":26,"end":28,"text":"腹泻","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":29,"end":32,"text":"稀水便","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":37,"end":43,"text":"肺部有实变征","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":45,"end":46,"text":"干","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":47,"end":51,"text":"湿性啰音","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":2,"end":3,"text":"涕","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":4,"end":5,"text":"鼻","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":7,"end":8,"text":"头","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":15,"end":17,"text":"肌肉","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":23,"end":24,"text":"腹","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":26,"end":27,"text":"腹","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":31,"end":32,"text":"便","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":37,"end":39,"text":"肺部","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":40,"end":43,"text":"实变征","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":17,"end":19,"text":"酸痛","labels":["symptom"]}]
text: 有流涕、鼻塞、头痛、全身不适和肌肉酸痛、恶心、腹痛和腹泻、稀水便，半数病人肺部有实变征，有干、湿性啰音。

label: [{"start":14,"end":18,"text":"出血征象","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":22,"end":28,"text":"口腔黏膜瘀点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":26,"end":28,"text":"瘀点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":29,"end":31,"text":"瘀斑","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":32,"end":49,"text":"四肢及胸腹部皮肤可见大片瘀点和瘀斑","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":44,"end":46,"text":"瘀点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":47,"end":49,"text":"瘀斑","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":50,"end":52,"text":"咳嗽","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":53,"end":57,"text":"痰中带血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":58,"end":60,"text":"血尿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":61,"end":63,"text":"血便","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":64,"end":70,"text":"血压明显下降","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":71,"end":73,"text":"休克","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":74,"end":81,"text":"肺炎进行性加重","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":82,"end":93,"text":"血氧饱和度和氧分压下降","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":97,"end":100,"text":"肺出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":98,"end":100,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":101,"end":105,"text":"胸腔积液","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":103,"end":105,"text":"积液","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":106,"end":115,"text":"急性呼吸窘迫综合征","labels":["disease"]},{"start":116,"end":122,"text":"全血细胞减少","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":123,"end":128,"text":"肾功能衰竭","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":126,"end":128,"text":"衰竭","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":129,"end":136,"text":"多脏器功能衰竭","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":134,"end":136,"text":"衰竭","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":22,"end":26,"text":"口腔黏膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":32,"end":34,"text":"四肢","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":35,"end":40,"text":"胸腹部皮肤","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":59,"end":60,"text":"尿","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":62,"end":63,"text":"便","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":74,"end":76,"text":"肺炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":97,"end":98,"text":"肺","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":101,"end":103,"text":"胸腔","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":116,"end":120,"text":"全血细胞","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":123,"end":124,"text":"肾","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":120,"end":122,"text":"减少","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 部分患者病情进展快，有明显的出血征象，表现为口腔黏膜瘀点、瘀斑，四肢及胸腹部皮肤可见大片瘀点和瘀斑，咳嗽、痰中带血，血尿或血便，血压明显下降、休克，肺炎进行性加重，血氧饱和度和氧分压下降，可出现肺出血、胸腔积液、急性呼吸窘迫综合征、全血细胞减少、肾功能衰竭和多脏器功能衰竭。

label: [{"start":11,"end":13,"text":"家禽","labels":["type"]},{"start":28,"end":37,"text":"血清抗体有4倍升高","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 诊断：曾到过疫区，有与家禽及猪接触史，出现典型临床症状。血清抗体有4倍升高。

label: [{"start":17,"end":23,"text":"甲型流感病毒","labels":["disease"]},{"start":30,"end":36,"text":"禽流感血清型","labels":["disease"]},{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"血清","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":3,"end":9,"text":"呼吸道分泌物","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":10,"end":11,"text":"咽","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 血清、呼吸道分泌物和咽拭子可分离出甲型流感病毒，为上述常见的禽流感血清型。

label: [{"start":13,"end":21,"text":"禽流感病毒RNA","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 用PCR法检测上述标本，有禽流感病毒RNA，须经测序鉴定。

label: [{"start":6,"end":13,"text":"对症和支持治疗","labels":["control"]},{"start":14,"end":22,"text":"密切观察病情变化","labels":["control"]}]
text: 治疗：主要是对症和支持治疗。密切观察病情变化，及时给予相应治疗。

label: [{"start":5,"end":10,"text":"抗病毒治疗","labels":["control"]},{"start":12,"end":16,"text":"金刚烷胺","labels":["drug"]},{"start":17,"end":21,"text":"金刚乙胺","labels":["drug"]},{"start":22,"end":30,"text":"神经氨酸酶抑制剂","labels":["drug"]},{"start":32,"end":36,"text":"奥司他韦","labels":["drug"]},{"start":37,"end":41,"text":"札那米韦","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 早期可应用抗病毒治疗，如金刚烷胺、金刚乙胺和神经氨酸酶抑制剂，如奥司他韦和札那米韦。

label: [{"start":3,"end":8,"text":"对患者隔离","labels":["control"]},{"start":9,"end":16,"text":"接触者应戴口罩","labels":["control"]},{"start":17,"end":30,"text":"对受染动物应立即杀灭及深埋","labels":["control"]}]
text: 预防应对患者隔离，接触者应戴口罩，对受染动物应立即杀灭及深埋。

label: [{"start":1,"end":15,"text":"对疫地及周围环境进行严密消毒","labels":["control"]},{"start":17,"end":31,"text":"密切接触者可口服抗病毒药预防","labels":["control"]},{"start":25,"end":29,"text":"抗病毒药","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 并对疫地及周围环境进行严密消毒，对密切接触者可口服抗病毒药预防。
